page.title: 08MY DAY
page.content: I wake up at 7.15 and mum calls me to get up.I lie there doing nothing and thinking about the day to come. Mum then brings me a cup of coffee.I then have to get up and get ready for school. At 8.10 I leave home and go to meet Nicola. We talk about what we did the night before and our different homeworks.School starts at 8.45 with registration in our form room. First lesson is Music followed by Geography oh good we are doing Domesday again I wish I was born in 1086. After lunch its French followed by English and then ...HOME. 4.00 home at last now to watch some television before Mam cooks the tea. 6.00 Dad arrives home,looks like he is in a bad mood again I better keep out of his way. More homework to do tonight,time for bed..'Good night Sarah','Good night Mam'
